answers.answer: Swelling is normal, especially if you spend a lot of time on your feet. Just elevate your feet and the swelling should go down. If anything take a warm bath to bring the swelling down
I had swellen like that ppl told me it was normal n that was not the case i ended having preeclampsia but your doctor will know if thats the case or not most of the time it is normal

question: Im 35 weeks and i've never experncd ths before. But today when i saw my ankles they lookd so puffy! Should I worry about it??
title: when to worry about swelling???
